keyMoments.title: Invade Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates, led by Hody Jones, successfully invade Ryugu Palace alongside Vander Decken IX and his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the coup attempt to overthrow the Ryugu Kingdom and establish fish-man supremacy.

statusHistory.description: Operating as a militant pirate crew focused on fish-man supremacy

ideology: Fish-man supremacy and extreme hatred toward humans

notableActions.impact: Began coup attempt against Neptune's rule

symbolism: The New Fish-Man Pirates represent the cycle of hatred and inherited prejudice, fighting for supremacy rather than equality.
